description: Need help with Quicksilver? Here are the best ways to get support.

discussions.body: The GitHub Discussions forum is the best place to ask questions, share tips, and connect with other Quicksilver users.
discussions.description: Ask questions and get help from the community
discussions.title: GitHub Discussions

documentation.body: The manual covers everything from installation to advanced triggers and plugins. It's the best place to start learning.
documentation.description: Start with the official Quicksilver Manual
documentation.title: Documentation

faq.body: Find answers to common questions about Quicksilver, troubleshooting tips, and learn why Quicksilver might be the right choice for you.
faq.title: FAQ

issues.body: If you've found a bug, please report it on GitHub Issues. Include your macOS version, Quicksilver version, and steps to reproduce.
issues.description: Found something wrong? Let us know
issues.title: Report a Bug

title: Get Help
